articles.author: Ethan Siegel
articles.title: Yes, removing groundwater is changing Earth's tilt - Big Think
articles.description: Despite the enormous mass of the Earth, simply depleting our groundwater is changing our axial tilt. Simple Newtonian physics explains why.
